content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Yi-Nuo. The unfurnished apartment is in the city center and has a size of 50 square meters. I was thinking of a price of 750 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe the price can be higher. Let's try to negotiate a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Yi-Nuo. How about 800 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's a better price, but I believe we can do better. Let's try to aim higher.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, Yi-Nuo. I've been fair and reasonable in my offers. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe 800 Euro per month is a fair price for this apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 850 Euro per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 850 Euro per month!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 850 Euro per month!
